abstract: Technology executive Suni Munshani has restored 10-acre horse farm in Easton, Conn, that he coveted for years when it was owned by his neighbor, and eventually bought from her estate.
lead_paragraph: A technology entrepreneur restores a farm and renovates a 1935 house in Easton, Conn., fulfilling his longtime dream of owning a country home.

headline.print_headline: Where Horses, Llamas and Cows Once Roamed

snippet: A technology entrepreneur restores a farm and renovates a 1935 house in Easton, Conn., fulfilling his longtime dream of owning a country home.
